title: 3 Idiots
description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently.

title: Gully Boy
description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Bahubali: The Beginning
description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

title: Queen
description: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets canceled.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
description: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them â€“ until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

title: RRR
description: A fictional story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.

title: Sankranthi Ki Vastunam
description: A heartwarming tale of family reunion during the Sankranthi festival that explores traditions, relationships and cultural values.

title: Pushpa: The Rise
description: A laborer rises through the ranks of a red sandalwood smuggling syndicate, making enemies along the way.

title: Sita Ramam
description: An orphan soldier's life changes when he receives a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them.

title: Balagam
description: A poignant story set in rural Telangana that explores the traditions and rituals following the death of a village elder.
